reviews.review_msg: Students don't like to do work, and Paulo expects students to do work. This is why students don't like him. The work pays off, and if you're confused, contact him. He will meet you anywhere any time, and even phone you to make sure he makes himself clear. 6 novels isn't too much to read in a class.

Thinks that his is the only class you're taking all term: enough reading for 2 courses in 1. Participate in class or he'll be grumpy, everyone will suffer. Make sure that what you say won't prompt him to say something like, "Is what you're about to say going to be relevant?" Agree with his opinions!
